name: Reset User Password
description: Reset a user's password. You will need a strong password for that otherwise enable the password policy

basedn.title: BaseDN
basedn.description: The starting point an LDAP server uses when searching for users authentication within your Directory. (e.g DC=example-domain,DC=com)

new_password.title: NewPassword
new_password.description: New password, required to reset the old one of course.

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: Filter by displayName attribute to narrow results when multiple users share the same email

apply_to_all.title: Apply to All
apply_to_all.description: When true, apply action to all matching users instead of failing when multiple users are found

affected_users.title: Affected Users
affected_users.description: List of users affected by the action (only when apply_to_all is true)
